testcase.name: testSearch2

https://docs.oracle.com/error-help/db/ora-00904/ ### The error may exist in org/zerock/mapper/BoardMapper.xml ### The error may involve defaultParameterMap ### The error occurred while setting parameters ### SQL: select bno, title, content, regdate, updatedate from ( select /*+INDEX_DESC(tbl_board pk_board)*/ rownum rn, bno, title, content, regdate, updatedate from tbl_board where rownum <= ? * ? ) where ( title like '%'|| ? ||'%' or content like '%'|| ? ||'%' or writer like '%'|| ? ||'%' ) and rn > (? - 1) * ? ### Cause: java.sql.SQLSyntaxErrorException: ORA-00904: "WRITER": 부적합한 식별자
